Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Brevinin-2HS2 (Brevinin 2HS2, UCLL1; natural AMPs; frog, amphibians, animals)
Sequence Information.Source: Huia schmackeri(formerly Rana (Odorrana) schmackeri), China, Asia

Literature Information.Literature: Active against Gram-positive S. aureus ATCC2592 (MIC 19 uM), B. licheniformis X39 (MIC 39 uM), R. rhodochrous X15 (MIC 9.5 uM), Gram-negative P. faecalis X29 (MIC 9.5 uM), and fungi S. mouldd 090223 and C. albicans ATCC2002 (MIC 19-37.5 uM). Poor hemolysis (LC50=300 uM). (Wang H et al. 2012 Peptides 33 (1), 27-34). Found in multiple species. Updated Jan2012 Jan2020 GW.
Literature Information.Author: Quan Z, Zhou M, Chen W, Chen T, Walker B, Shaw C.2008
Literature Information.Title: Novel brevinins from Chinese piebald odorous frog (Huia schmackeri) skin deduced from cloned biosynthetic precursors
